title: I further confirm that the structural design and calculations shall be inconformity with the pro- visions of IS Code nos
clause_text: I further confirm that the structural design and calculations shall be inconformity with the pro- visions of IS Code nos. 1875,1893 &4326 taking into consideration the Seismic forces etc.as required by the planning authority. Subject: Drainage &Sanitation work of proposed development
